API Reference  5.0.5.165
Files | Data Structures | Typedefs | Enumerations | Functions
Drawing

Provides functions such as 2D graphics rendering, text drawing, and image display. More...

Files

file  drawing_bitmap.h
 Declares functions related to the bitmap object in the drawing module.
 
file  drawing_brush.h
 Declares functions related to the brush object in the drawing module.
 
file  drawing_canvas.h
 Declares functions related to the canvas object in the drawing module.

 Declares functions related to the color object in the drawing module.

 Declares functions related to the colorFilter object in the drawing module.

 Declares functions related to the colorSpace object in the drawing module.

 Declares functions related to the textBlob object in the drawing module.
 
file  drawing_text_declaration.h
 Declares the data structure related to text in 2D drawing.
 
file  drawing_text_font_descriptor.h
 Provide the ability to provide OH_Drawing_FontDescriptor.
 
file  drawing_text_typography.h
 Declares functions related to typography in the drawing module.
 
file  drawing_typeface.h
 Declares functions related to the typeface object in the drawing module.
 
file  drawing_types.h
 Declares the data types for drawing 2D graphics, including the canvas, brush, pen, bitmap, and path.

typedef struct OH_Drawing_Canvas OH_Drawing_Canvas
 Defines a rectangular canvas on which various shapes, images, and texts can be drawn by using the brush and pen. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_Pen OH_Drawing_Pen
 Defines a pen, which is used to describe the style and color to outline a shape. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_Region OH_Drawing_Region
 Defines a region, which is used to represent an enclosed area on the canvas layer. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_Brush OH_Drawing_Brush
 Defines as a brush, which is used to describe the style and color to fill in a shape. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_Path OH_Drawing_Path
 Defines a path, which is used to customize various shapes. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_Bitmap OH_Drawing_Bitmap
 Defines a bitmap, which is a memory that contains the pixel data of a shape. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_Point OH_Drawing_Point
 Defines a point, which is used to describe the coordinate point. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_PixelMap OH_Drawing_PixelMap
 Defines a pixelmap, which is used to wrap real pixelmap supported by image framework. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_ColorSpace OH_Drawing_ColorSpace
 Define color space to determine color information. More...
 
typedef OH_Drawing_Point2D OH_Drawing_Corner_Radii
 Defines a corner radii, which is on x-axis and y-axis. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_PathEffect OH_Drawing_PathEffect
 Defines a pathEffect, which is used to affects stroked paths. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_Rect OH_Drawing_Rect
 Defines a rect, which is used to describe the rectangle. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_RoundRect OH_Drawing_RoundRect
 Defines a roundRect, which is used to describe the round rectangle. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_Matrix OH_Drawing_Matrix
 Defines a matrix, which is used to describe the transforming coordinates. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect
 Defines a shaderEffect, which is used to describe the source color(s) for what is being drawn. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_ShadowLayer OH_Drawing_ShadowLayer
 Defines a shadowLayer, which is used to draw shaded parts. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_Filter OH_Drawing_Filter
 Defines a filter, which is used to store maskFilter, colorFilter and imageFilter. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_MaskFilter OH_Drawing_MaskFilter
 Defines a maskFilter, which is used to perform transformations on the mask before drawing it. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_ColorFilter OH_Drawing_ColorFilter
 Defines a colorFilter, which is called a color and returns a new color. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_Font OH_Drawing_Font
 Defines a font, which is used to describe the font. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_MemoryStream OH_Drawing_MemoryStream
 Defines a memoryStream, which is used to describe the memory stream. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_FontArguments OH_Drawing_FontArguments
 Defines fontArguments, which is used to describe the arguments for a font. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_Typeface OH_Drawing_Typeface
 Defines a typeface, which is used to describe the typeface. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_TextBlob OH_Drawing_TextBlob
 Defines a textBlob, which combines multiple text runs into an immutable container. Each text run consists of glyphs and positions. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_Image OH_Drawing_Image
 Defines a image, which is used to describe a two dimensional array of pixels to draw. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_ImageFilter OH_Drawing_ImageFilter
 Defines a image filter, which is used to operate on all the color bits of pixels that make up an image. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_SamplingOptions OH_Drawing_SamplingOptions
 Defines a sampling options, which is used to describe the sampling mode. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_TextBlobBuilder OH_Drawing_TextBlobBuilder
 Defines a textBlobBuilder, which is used to build the textBlob. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_GpuContext OH_Drawing_GpuContext
 Defines a GPU context, which is used to describe the GPU backend context. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_Surface OH_Drawing_Surface
 Defines a surface, which is used to manage the pixels that a canvas draws into. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_FontMgr OH_Drawing_FontMgr
 Defines a OH_Drawing_FontMgr, which is used to manage font family. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_FontStyleSet OH_Drawing_FontStyleSet
 Defines a OH_Drawing_FontStyleSet, which is used to manage font style. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_RecordCmdUtils OH_Drawing_RecordCmdUtils
 Define OH_Drawing_RecordCmdUtils, which is used to generate drawing commands tool. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_RecordCmd OH_Drawing_RecordCmd
 Define OH_Drawing_RecordCmd, which is used to replay drawing commands. More...
 
typedef struct OH_Drawing_Array OH_Drawing_Array
 Defines an array object, which is used to store multiple NDK object. More...

enum  OH_Drawing_BlendMode {
  BLEND_MODE_CLEAR, BLEND_MODE_SRC, BLEND_MODE_DST, BLEND_MODE_SRC_OVER,
  BLEND_MODE_DST_OVER, BLEND_MODE_SRC_IN, BLEND_MODE_DST_IN, BLEND_MODE_SRC_OUT,
  BLEND_MODE_DST_OUT, BLEND_MODE_SRC_ATOP, BLEND_MODE_DST_ATOP, BLEND_MODE_XOR,
  BLEND_MODE_PLUS, BLEND_MODE_MODULATE, BLEND_MODE_SCREEN, BLEND_MODE_OVERLAY,
  BLEND_MODE_DARKEN, BLEND_MODE_LIGHTEN, BLEND_MODE_COLOR_DODGE, BLEND_MODE_COLOR_BURN,
  BLEND_MODE_HARD_LIGHT, BLEND_MODE_SOFT_LIGHT, BLEND_MODE_DIFFERENCE, BLEND_MODE_EXCLUSION,
  BLEND_MODE_MULTIPLY, BLEND_MODE_HUE, BLEND_MODE_SATURATION, BLEND_MODE_COLOR,
  BLEND_MODE_LUMINOSITY
}
 The blending operation generates a new color for the two colors (source, destination). These operations are the same on the 4 color channels: red, green, blue, alpha. For these, we use alpha channel as an example, rather than naming each channel individually. More...
 
enum  OH_Drawing_TextEncoding { TEXT_ENCODING_UTF8, TEXT_ENCODING_UTF16, TEXT_ENCODING_UTF32, TEXT_ENCODING_GLYPH_ID }
 Enumerates text encoding types. More...

void OH_Drawing_MatrixPreRotate (OH_Drawing_Matrix *matrix, float degree, float px, float py)
 Sets matrix to matrix multiplied by matrix constructed from rotating by degrees about pivot point(px, py), positive degrees rotates clockwise. Given: More...
 
void OH_Drawing_MatrixPreScale (OH_Drawing_Matrix *matrix, float sx, float sy, float px, float py)
 Sets matrix to forward scale by sx and sy, about a pivot point at (px, py). Given: More...
 
void OH_Drawing_MatrixPreTranslate (OH_Drawing_Matrix *matrix, float dx, float dy)
 Sets forward matrix to translate by dx and dy. Given: | A B C | | 1 0 dx | Matrix = | D E F |, T(dx, dy) = | 0 1 dy | | G H I | | 0 0 1 | sets Matrix to: | A B C | | 1 0 dx | | A B A*dx+B*dy+C | Matrix * T(dx, dy) = | D E F | | 0 1 dy | = | D E D*dx+E*dy+F | | G H I | | 0 0 1 | | G H G*dx+H*dy+I |. More...
 
void OH_Drawing_MatrixPostRotate (OH_Drawing_Matrix *matrix, float degree, float px, float py)
 Sets matrix to matrix constructed from rotating by degrees about pivot point(px, py), multiplied by matrix, positive degrees rotates clockwise. Given: More...
 
void OH_Drawing_MatrixPostScale (OH_Drawing_Matrix *matrix, float sx, float sy, float px, float py)
 Sets matrix to backward scale by sx and sy, about a pivot point at (px, py). Given: | J K L | | sx 0 dx | Matrix = | M N O |, S(sx, sy, px, py) = | 0 sy dy | | P Q R | | 0 0 1 | where: dx = px - sx * px dy = py - sy * py sets Matrix to: | sx 0 dx | | J K L | | sx*J+dx*P sx*K+dx*Q sx*L+dx+R | S(sx, sy, px, py) * Matrix = | 0 sy dy | | M N O | = | sy*M+dy*P sy*N+dy*Q sy*O+dy*R | | 0 0 1 | | P Q R | | P Q R |. More...
 
void OH_Drawing_MatrixPostTranslate (OH_Drawing_Matrix *matrix, float dx, float dy)
 Sets backward matrix to translate by (dx, dy). Given: More...
 
void OH_Drawing_MatrixReset (OH_Drawing_Matrix *matrix)
 Reset matrix to identity, which has no effect on mapped point, sets matrix to: | 1 0 0 | | 0 1 0 | | 0 0 1 |. More...
 
void OH_Drawing_MatrixConcat (OH_Drawing_Matrix *total, const OH_Drawing_Matrix *a, const OH_Drawing_Matrix *b)
 Sets matrix total to matrix a multiplied by matrix b. Given: | A B C | | J K L | a = | D E F |, b = | M N O | | G H I | | P Q R | sets Matrix total to: | A B C | | J K L | | AJ+BM+CP AK+BN+CQ AL+BO+CR | total = a * b = | D E F | * | M N O | = | DJ+EM+FP DK+EN+FQ DL+EO+FR | | G H I | | P Q R | | GJ+HM+IP GK+HN+IQ GL+HO+IR | SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing. More...

void OH_Drawing_PathAddArc (OH_Drawing_Path *path, const OH_Drawing_Rect *rect, float startAngle, float sweepAngle)
 Appends arc to path, as the start of new contour.Arc added is part of ellipse bounded by oval, from startAngle through sweepAngle. Both startAngle and sweepAngle are measured in degrees, where zero degrees is aligned with the positive x-axis, and positive sweeps extends arc clockwise.If sweepAngle <= -360, or sweepAngle >= 360; and startAngle modulo 90 is nearly zero, append oval instead of arc. Otherwise, sweepAngle values are treated modulo 360, and arc may or may not draw depending on numeric rounding. More...

OH_Drawing_Typeface * OH_Drawing_TypefaceCreateFromFileWithArguments (const char *path, const OH_Drawing_FontArguments *fontArguments)
 Creates an OH_Drawing_Typeface object with the specified font arguments from a file. If the OH_Drawing_Typeface object does not support the variations described in fontArguments, this function creates an OH_Drawing_Typeface object without font arguments. In this case, this function provides the same capability as OH_Drawing_TypefaceCreateFromFile. More...

Detailed Description

Provides functions such as 2D graphics rendering, text drawing, and image display.

Provides the font descriptor capability.

Provides the 2D drawing capability.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Since
8
Version
1.0

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

11
Version
1.0

Enumeration Type Documentation

◆ OH_Drawing_AlphaFormat

enum OH_Drawing_AlphaFormat

Enumerates alpha formats of bitmap pixels.

Since
8
Version
1.0
Enumerator
ALPHA_FORMAT_UNKNOWN 

Unknown format.

ALPHA_FORMAT_OPAQUE 

The bitmap does not have the alpha component.

ALPHA_FORMAT_PREMUL 

The color component of each pixel is premultiplied by the alpha component.

ALPHA_FORMAT_UNPREMUL 

The color component of each pixel is not premultiplied by the alpha component.

Definition at line 355 of file drawing_types.h.

◆ OH_Drawing_BlendMode

enum OH_Drawing_BlendMode

The blending operation generates a new color for the two colors (source, destination). These operations are the same on the 4 color channels: red, green, blue, alpha. For these, we use alpha channel as an example, rather than naming each channel individually.

For brevity, we use the following abbreviations. s : source d : destination sa : source alpha da : destination alpha

Results are abbreviated r : if all 4 channels are computed in the same manner ra : result alpha channel rc : result "color": red, green, blue channels

Since
11
Version
1.0
Enumerator
BLEND_MODE_CLEAR 

r = 0.

BLEND_MODE_SRC 

r = s.

BLEND_MODE_DST 

r = d.

BLEND_MODE_SRC_OVER 

r = s + (1-sa)*d.

BLEND_MODE_DST_OVER 

r = d + (1-da)*s.

BLEND_MODE_SRC_IN 

r = s * da.

BLEND_MODE_DST_IN 

r = d * sa.

BLEND_MODE_SRC_OUT 

r = s * (1-da).

BLEND_MODE_DST_OUT 

r = d * (1-sa).

BLEND_MODE_SRC_ATOP 

r = s*da + d*(1-sa).

BLEND_MODE_DST_ATOP 

r = d*sa + s*(1-da).

BLEND_MODE_XOR 

r = s*(1-da) + d*(1-sa).

BLEND_MODE_PLUS 

r = min(s + d, 1).

BLEND_MODE_MODULATE 

r = s*d.

BLEND_MODE_SCREEN 

r = s + d - s*d.

BLEND_MODE_OVERLAY 

multiply or screen, depending on destination.

BLEND_MODE_DARKEN 

rc = s + d - max(s*da, d*sa), ra = s + (1-sa)*d.

BLEND_MODE_LIGHTEN 

rc = s + d - min(s*da, d*sa), ra = s + (1-sa)*d.

BLEND_MODE_COLOR_DODGE 

brighten destination to reflect source.

BLEND_MODE_COLOR_BURN 

darken destination to reflect source.

BLEND_MODE_HARD_LIGHT 

multiply or screen, depending on source.

BLEND_MODE_SOFT_LIGHT 

lighten or darken, depending on source.

BLEND_MODE_DIFFERENCE 

rc = s + d - 2*(min(s*da, d*sa)), ra = s + (1-sa)*d.

BLEND_MODE_EXCLUSION 

rc = s + d - two(s*d), ra = s + (1-sa)*d.

BLEND_MODE_MULTIPLY 

r = s*(1-da) + d*(1-sa) + s*d.

BLEND_MODE_HUE 

hue of source with saturation and luminosity of destination.

BLEND_MODE_SATURATION 

saturation of source with hue and luminosity of destination.

BLEND_MODE_COLOR 

hue and saturation of source with luminosity of destination.

BLEND_MODE_LUMINOSITY 

luminosity of source with hue and saturation of destination.

Definition at line 385 of file drawing_types.h.

Definition at line 629 of file drawing_canvas.h.

◆ OH_Drawing_ColorFormat

enum OH_Drawing_ColorFormat

Enumerates storage formats of bitmap pixels.

Since
8
Version
1.0
Enumerator
COLOR_FORMAT_UNKNOWN 

Unknown format.

COLOR_FORMAT_ALPHA_8 

Each pixel is represented by 8 bits, which together indicate alpha.

COLOR_FORMAT_RGB_565 

Each pixel is represented by 16 bits. From the most significant bit to the least significant bit, the first 5 bits indicate red, the subsequent 6 bits indicate green, and the last 5 bits indicate blue.

COLOR_FORMAT_ARGB_4444 

Each pixel is represented by 16 bits. From the most significant bit to the least significant bit, every 4 bits indicate alpha, red, green, and blue, respectively.

COLOR_FORMAT_RGBA_8888 

Each pixel is represented by 32 bits. From the most significant bit to the least significant bit, every 8 bits indicate alpha, red, green, and blue, respectively.

COLOR_FORMAT_BGRA_8888 

Each pixel is represented by 32 bits. From the most significant bit to the least significant bit, every 8 bits indicate blue, green, red, and alpha, respectively.

Definition at line 322 of file drawing_types.h.

◆ OH_Drawing_PenLineCapStyle

enum OH_Drawing_PenLineCapStyle

Enumerates line cap styles of a pen. The line cap style defines the style of both ends of a line segment drawn by the pen.

Since
8
Version
1.0
Enumerator
LINE_FLAT_CAP 

There is no cap style. Both ends of the line segment are cut off square.

LINE_SQUARE_CAP 

Square cap style. Both ends have a square, the height of which is half of the width of the line segment, with the same width.

LINE_ROUND_CAP 

Round cap style. Both ends have a semicircle centered, the diameter of which is the same as the width of the line segment.

Definition at line 208 of file drawing_pen.h.

◆ OH_Drawing_TextAlign

enum OH_Drawing_TextAlign

Enumerates text alignment modes.

Since
8
Version
1.0
Enumerator
TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT 

Left-aligned

TEXT_ALIGN_RIGHT 

Right-aligned

TEXT_ALIGN_CENTER 

Center-aligned

TEXT_ALIGN_JUSTIFY 

Justified, which means that each line (except the last line) is stretched so that every line has equal width, and the left and right margins are straight.

TEXT_ALIGN_START 

TEXT_ALIGN_START achieves the same effect as TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT when OH_Drawing_TextDirection is TEXT_DIRECTION_LTR; it achieves the same effect as TEXT_ALIGN_RIGHT when OH_Drawing_TextDirection is TEXT_DIRECTION_RTL.

TEXT_ALIGN_END 

TEXT_ALIGN_END achieves the same effect as TEXT_ALIGN_RIGHT when OH_Drawing_TextDirection is TEXT_DIRECTION_LTR; it achieves the same effect as TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT when OH_Drawing_TextDirection is TEXT_DIRECTION_RTL.

11
Version
1.0
Enumerator
CLAMP 

Replicate the edge color if the shader effect draws outside of its original bounds.

REPEAT 

Repeat the shader effect image horizontally and vertically.

MIRROR 

Repeat the shader effect image horizontally and vertically, alternating mirror images so that adjacent images always seam.

DECAL 

Only draw within the original domain, return transparent-black everywhere else.

◆ OH_Drawing_BitmapBuild()

void OH_Drawing_BitmapBuild ( OH_Drawing_Bitmap *  bitmap,
const uint32_t  width,
const uint32_t  height,
const OH_Drawing_BitmapFormat *  bitmapFormat 
)

Initializes the width and height of an OH_Drawing_Bitmap object and sets the pixel format for the bitmap.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
bitmapIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Bitmap object.
widthIndicates the width of the bitmap to be initialized.
heightIndicates the height of the bitmap to be initialized.
bitmapFormatIndicates the pixel format of the bitmap to be initialized, including the pixel color type and alpha type.
Since
8
Version
1.0

int32_t  srcY 
)

Copies a rect of pixels from bitmap to dstPixels. Copy starts at (srcX, srcY), and does not exceed bitmap width and height.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
bitmapIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Bitmap object.
dstInfoIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Image_Info object.
dstPixelsDestination pixel storage.
dstRowBytesDestination row length.
srcXColumn index whose absolute value is less than width.
srcYRow index whose absolute value is less than height.
Returns
Returns true if pixels are copied to dstPixels.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_BrushCopy()

OH_Drawing_Brush* OH_Drawing_BrushCopy ( OH_Drawing_Brush *  brush)

Creates an OH_Drawing_Brush copy object.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
brushIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Brush object.
Returns
Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_Brush object created. If nullptr is returned, the creation fails. The possible cause of the failure is that the available memory is empty or a nullptr is passed.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_BrushIsAntiAlias()

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters

◆ OH_Drawing_CanvasDrawShadow()

void OH_Drawing_CanvasDrawShadow ( OH_Drawing_Canvas *  canvas,
OH_Drawing_Path *  path,
OH_Drawing_Point3D  planeParams,
OH_Drawing_Point3D  devLightPos,
float  lightRadius,
uint32_t  ambientColor,
uint32_t  spotColor,
OH_Drawing_CanvasShadowFlags  flag 
)

Use circular light to draw an offset spot shadow and outlining ambient shadow for the given path.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
canvasIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Canvas object.
pathIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Path object, use to generate shadows.
planeParamsRepresents the value of the function which returns Z offset of the occluder from the canvas based on x and y.
devLightPosRepresents the position of the light relative to the canvas.
lightRadiusThe radius of the circular light.
ambientColorAmbient shadow's color.
spotColorSpot shadow's color.
flagIndicates the flag to control opaque occluder, shadow, and light position.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_CanvasDrawSingleCharacter()

float  y 
)

Parameters

strIndicates the single character encoded in UTF-8.

yIndicates the vertical offset applied to the single character.
Returns

1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_ColorSetArgb()

uint32_t OH_Drawing_ColorSetArgb ( uint32_t  alpha,
uint32_t  red,
uint32_t  green,
uint32_t  blue 
)

Converts four variables (alpha, red, green, and blue) into a 32-bit (ARGB) variable that describes a color.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
alphaIndicates a variable that describes alpha. The value ranges from 0x00 to 0xFF.
redIndicates a variable that describes red. The value ranges from 0x00 to 0xFF.
greenIndicates a variable that describes green. The value ranges from 0x00 to 0xFF.
blueIndicates a variable that describes blue. The value ranges from 0x00 to 0xFF.
Returns
Returns a 32-bit (ARGB) variable that describes the color.
Since
8
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_FontArgumentsAddVariation()

OH_Drawing_ErrorCode OH_Drawing_FontArgumentsAddVariation ( OH_Drawing_FontArguments *  fontArguments,
const char *  axis,
float  value 
)

Adds a font variation axis for an OH_Drawing_FontArguments object.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
fontArgumentsIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_FontArguments object.
axisIndicates the axis tag, which must contain four ASCII characters.
valueIndicates the value of the axis field.
Returns
Returns the error code. Returns OH_DRAWING_SUCCESS if the operation is successful. Returns OH_DRAWING_ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER if either fontArguments or axis is nullptr, or the length of axis is not 4.
Since
13
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_FontArgumentsCreate()

OH_Drawing_FontArguments* OH_Drawing_FontArgumentsCreate ( void  )

Creates an OH_Drawing_FontArguments object.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Returns
Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_FontArguments object created. If nullptr is returned, the creation fails. The possible cause of the failure is that the available memory is empty.
Since
13
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_FontArgumentsDestroy()

◆ OH_Drawing_ImageFilterCreateBlur()

OH_Drawing_ImageFilter* OH_Drawing_ImageFilterCreateBlur ( float  sigmaX,
float  sigmaY,
OH_Drawing_TileMode  tileMode,
OH_Drawing_ImageFilter *  imageFilter 
)

Creates an OH_Drawing_ImageFilter object that blurs its input by the separate x and y sigmas.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
sigmaXIndicates the Gaussian sigma value for blurring along the x axis.
sigmaYIndicates the Gaussian sigma value for blurring along the y axis.
tileModeIndicates the tile mode applied at edges.
imageFilterIndicates the input filter that is blurred, uses source bitmap if this is null.
Returns
Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_ImageFilter object created. If nullptr is returned, the creation fails. The possible cause of the failure is that the available memory is empty.
Since
12
Version
1.0

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters

imageFilterIndicates the input filter, or uses the source bitmap if this is null.
Returns
Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_ImageFilter object created. If nullptr is returned, the creation fails. The possible cause of the failure is that the available memory is empty or a nullptr OH_Drawing_ColorFilter is passed.

◆ OH_Drawing_MatrixConcat()

void OH_Drawing_MatrixConcat ( OH_Drawing_Matrix *  total,
const OH_Drawing_Matrix *  a,
const OH_Drawing_Matrix *  b 
)

Sets matrix total to matrix a multiplied by matrix b. Given: | A B C | | J K L | a = | D E F |, b = | M N O | | G H I | | P Q R | sets Matrix total to: | A B C | | J K L | | AJ+BM+CP AK+BN+CQ AL+BO+CR | total = a * b = | D E F | * | M N O | = | DJ+EM+FP DK+EN+FQ DL+EO+FR | | G H I | | P Q R | | GJ+HM+IP GK+HN+IQ GL+HO+IR | SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing.

Parameters
totalIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Matrix object that a * b.
aIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Matrix object.
bIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Matrix object.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_MatrixPostRotate()

void OH_Drawing_MatrixPostRotate ( OH_Drawing_Matrix *  matrix,
float  degree,
float  px,
float  py 
)

Sets matrix to matrix constructed from rotating by degrees about pivot point(px, py), multiplied by matrix, positive degrees rotates clockwise. Given:

| J K L | | c -s dx | Matrix = | M N O |, R(degrees, px, py) = | s c dy | | P Q R | | 0 0 1 |

where: 

c  = cos(degrees)
s  = sin(degrees)
dx =  s * py + (1 - c) * px
dy = -s * px + (1 - c) * py

sets Matrix to: 

                              |c -s dx| |J K L|   |cJ-sM+dx*P cK-sN+dx*Q cL-sO+dx+R|
R(degrees, px, py) * Matrix = |s  c dy| |M N O| = |sJ+cM+dy*P sK+cN+dy*Q sL+cO+dy*R|
                              |0  0  1| |P Q R|   |         P          Q          R|

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
matrixIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Matrix object.
degreeIndicates the angle of axes relative to upright axes.
pxIndicates the pivot on x-axis.
pyIndicates the pivot on y-axis.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_MatrixPostScale()

void OH_Drawing_MatrixPostScale ( OH_Drawing_Matrix *  matrix,
float  sx,
float  sy,
float  px,
float  py 
)

Sets matrix to backward scale by sx and sy, about a pivot point at (px, py). Given: | J K L | | sx 0 dx | Matrix = | M N O |, S(sx, sy, px, py) = | 0 sy dy | | P Q R | | 0 0 1 | where: dx = px - sx * px dy = py - sy * py sets Matrix to: | sx 0 dx | | J K L | | sx*J+dx*P sx*K+dx*Q sx*L+dx+R | S(sx, sy, px, py) * Matrix = | 0 sy dy | | M N O | = | sy*M+dy*P sy*N+dy*Q sy*O+dy*R | | 0 0 1 | | P Q R | | P Q R |.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
matrixIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Matrix object.
sxHorizontal scale factor.
syVertical scale factor.
pxPivot on x-axis.
pyPivot on y-axis.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_MatrixPostTranslate()

void OH_Drawing_MatrixPostTranslate ( OH_Drawing_Matrix *  matrix,
float  dx,
float  dy 
)

Sets backward matrix to translate by (dx, dy). Given:

| J K L | | 1 0 dx | Matrix = | M N O |, T(dx, dy) = | 0 1 dy | | P Q R | | 0 0 1 |

sets Matrix to: 

                     | 1 0 dx | | J K L |   | J+dx*P K+dx*Q L+dx*R |
T(dx, dy) * Matrix = | 0 1 dy | | M N O | = | M+dy*P N+dy*Q O+dy*R |
                     | 0 0  1 | | P Q R |   |      P      Q      R |

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
matrixIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Matrix object.
dxIndicates the horizontal translation.
dyIndicates the vertical translation.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_MatrixPreRotate()

void OH_Drawing_MatrixPreRotate ( OH_Drawing_Matrix *  matrix,
float  degree,
float  px,
float  py 
)

Sets matrix to matrix multiplied by matrix constructed from rotating by degrees about pivot point(px, py), positive degrees rotates clockwise. Given:

| A B C | | c -s dx | Matrix = | D E F |, R(degrees, px, py) = | s c dy | | G H I | | 0 0 1 |

where: 

c  = cos(degrees)
s  = sin(degrees)
dx =  s * py + (1 - c) * px
dy = -s * px + (1 - c) * py

sets Matrix to: 

                              | A B C | | c -s dx |   | Ac+Bs -As+Bc A*dx+B*dy+C |
Matrix * R(degrees, px, py) = | D E F | | s  c dy | = | Dc+Es -Ds+Ec D*dx+E*dy+F |
                              | G H I | | 0  0  1 |   | Gc+Hs -Gs+Hc G*dx+H*dy+I |

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
matrixIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Matrix object.
degreeIndicates the angle of axes relative to upright axes.
pxIndicates the pivot on x-axis.
pyIndicates the pivot on y-axis.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_MatrixPreScale()

void OH_Drawing_MatrixPreScale ( OH_Drawing_Matrix *  matrix,
float  sx,
float  sy,
float  px,
float  py 
)

Sets matrix to forward scale by sx and sy, about a pivot point at (px, py). Given:

| A B C | | sx 0 dx | Matrix =| D E F |, S(sx, sy, px, py) = | 0 sy dy | | G H I | | 0 0 1 |

where: 

dx = px - sx * px
dy = py - sy * py

sets Matrix to: 

                             | A B C | | sx  0 dx |   | A*sx B*sy A*dx+B*dy+C |
Matrix * S(sx, sy, px, py) = | D E F | |  0 sy dy | = | D*sx E*sy D*dx+E*dy+F |
                             | G H I | |  0  0  1 |   | G*sx H*sy G*dx+H*dy+I |

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
matrixIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Matrix object.
sxHorizontal scale factor.
syVertical scale factor.
pxPivot on x-axis.
pyPivot on y-axis.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_MatrixPreTranslate()

void OH_Drawing_MatrixPreTranslate ( OH_Drawing_Matrix *  matrix,
float  dx,
float  dy 
)

Sets forward matrix to translate by dx and dy. Given: | A B C | | 1 0 dx | Matrix = | D E F |, T(dx, dy) = | 0 1 dy | | G H I | | 0 0 1 | sets Matrix to: | A B C | | 1 0 dx | | A B A*dx+B*dy+C | Matrix * T(dx, dy) = | D E F | | 0 1 dy | = | D E D*dx+E*dy+F | | G H I | | 0 0 1 | | G H G*dx+H*dy+I |.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
matrixIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Matrix object.
dxIndicates the horizontal translation.
dyIndicates the vertical translation.
Since
12
Version
1.0

Creates a OH_Drawing_MemoryStream object.

Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_MemoryStream object created.

datafile path.
lengthData length.
copyDataCopy data or not.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_MemoryStreamDestroy()

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

memoryStreamIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_MemoryStream object.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_PathAddArc()

void OH_Drawing_PathAddArc ( OH_Drawing_Path *  path,
const OH_Drawing_Rect *  rect,
float  startAngle,
float  sweepAngle 
)

Appends arc to path, as the start of new contour.Arc added is part of ellipse bounded by oval, from startAngle through sweepAngle. Both startAngle and sweepAngle are measured in degrees, where zero degrees is aligned with the positive x-axis, and positive sweeps extends arc clockwise.If sweepAngle <= -360, or sweepAngle >= 360; and startAngle modulo 90 is nearly zero, append oval instead of arc. Otherwise, sweepAngle values are treated modulo 360, and arc may or may not draw depending on numeric rounding.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
pathIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Path object.
rectIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Rect object.
startAngleIndicates the starting angle of arc in degrees.
sweepAngleIndicates the sweep, in degrees. Positive is clockwise.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_PathAddCircle()

void OH_Drawing_PathAddCircle ( OH_Drawing_Path *  path,
float  x,
float  y,
float  radius,
OH_Drawing_PathDirection  pathDirection 
)

Adds a circle to the path, and wound in the specified direction.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
pathIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Path object.
xIndicates the x coordinate of the center of the circle.
yIndicates the y coordinate of the center of the circle.
radiusIndicates the radius of the circle.
pathDirectionIndicates the path direction.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_PathArcTo()

void OH_Drawing_PathArcTo ( OH_Drawing_Path *  path,
float  x1,
float  y1,
float  x2,
float  y2,
float  startDeg,
float  sweepDeg 
)

Draws an arc to a path.

This is done by using angle arc mode. In this mode, a rectangle that encloses an ellipse is specified first, and then a start angle and a sweep angle are specified. The arc is a portion of the ellipse defined by the start angle and the sweep angle. By default, a line segment from the last point of the path to the start point of the arc is also added.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
pathIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Path object.
x1Indicates the x coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle.
y1Indicates the y coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle.
x2Indicates the x coordinate of the lower right corner of the rectangle.
y2Indicates the y coordinate of the lower right corner of the rectangle.
startDegIndicates the start angle, in degrees.
sweepDegIndicates the angle to sweep, in degrees.
Since
8
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_PathBuildFromSvgString()

bool OH_Drawing_PathBuildFromSvgString ( OH_Drawing_Path *  path,
const char *  str 
)

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters

strIndicates the string of the SVG path.
Returns
Returns true if build path is successful, returns false otherwise.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_PenGetMiterLimit()

float OH_Drawing_PenGetMiterLimit ( const OH_Drawing_Pen *  pen)

Obtains the stroke miter limit of a polyline drawn by a pen.

When the corner type is bevel, a beveled corner is displayed if the miter limit is exceeded, and a mitered corner is displayed if the miter limit is not exceeded.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
penIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Pen object.
Returns
Returns the miter limit.
Since
8
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_PenGetWidth()

Parameters
penIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Pen object.
Returns
Returns the thickness.

◆ OH_Drawing_PenIsAntiAlias()

bool OH_Drawing_PenIsAntiAlias ( const OH_Drawing_Pen *  pen)

Checks whether anti-aliasing is enabled for a pen. If anti-aliasing is enabled, edges will be drawn with partial transparency.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
penIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Pen object.
Returns
Returns true if anti-aliasing is enabled; returns false otherwise.
Since
8
Version
1.0

Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_SamplingOptions object created.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_ShaderEffectCreateColorShader()

OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect* OH_Drawing_ShaderEffectCreateColorShader ( const uint32_t  color)

Creates an OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect that generates a shader with single color.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
colorIndicates the color used by the shader.
Returns
Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect object created. If nullptr is returned, the creation fails. The possible cause of the failure is that the available memory is empty.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_ShaderEffectCreateImageShader()

OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect* OH_Drawing_ShaderEffectCreateImageShader ( OH_Drawing_Image *  image,
OH_Drawing_TileMode  tileX,
OH_Drawing_TileMode  tileY,
const OH_Drawing_SamplingOptions *  samplingOptions,
const OH_Drawing_Matrix *  matrix 
)

Creates an OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect that generates a image shader.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
imageIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Image object.
tileXIndicates the tileX.
tileYIndicates the tileY.
samplingOptionsIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_SamplingOptions object.
matrixIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Matrix object. If matrix is nullptr, defaults to the identity matrix.
Returns
Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect object created.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_ShaderEffectCreateLinearGradient()

OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect* OH_Drawing_ShaderEffectCreateLinearGradient ( const OH_Drawing_Point *  startPt,
const OH_Drawing_Point *  endPt,
const uint32_t *  colors,
const float *  pos,
uint32_t  size,
OH_Drawing_TileMode  tileMode 
)

Creates an OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect that generates a linear gradient between the two specified points.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
startPtIndicates the start point for the gradient.
endPtIndicates the end point for the gradient.
colorsIndicates the colors to be distributed between the two points.
posIndicates the relative position of each corresponding color in the colors array.
sizeIndicates the number of colors and pos.
tileModeIndicates the tile mode.
Returns
Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect object created.
Since
11
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_ShaderEffectCreateLinearGradientWithLocalMatrix()

OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect* OH_Drawing_ShaderEffectCreateLinearGradientWithLocalMatrix ( const OH_Drawing_Point2D *  startPt,
const OH_Drawing_Point2D *  endPt,
const uint32_t *  colors,
const float *  pos,
uint32_t  size,
OH_Drawing_TileMode  tileMode,
const OH_Drawing_Matrix *  matrix 
)

Creates an OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect that generates a linear gradient between the two specified points.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
startPtIndicates the start point for the gradient.
endPtIndicates the end point for the gradient.
colorsIndicates the colors to be distributed between the two points.
posIndicates the relative position of each corresponding color in the colors array. If pos is nullptr, the colors are evenly distributed between the start and end point.
sizeIndicates the number of colors and pos(if pos is not nullptr).
tileModeIndicates the tile mode.
matrixIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Matrix object, which represents the local matrix of the created OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect object. If matrix is nullptr, defaults to the identity matrix.
Returns
Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect object created. If nullptr is returned, the creation fails. The possible cause of the failure is any of startPt, endPt, colors and pos is nullptr.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_ShaderEffectCreateRadialGradient()

OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect* OH_Drawing_ShaderEffectCreateRadialGradient ( const OH_Drawing_Point *  centerPt,
float  radius,
const uint32_t *  colors,
const float *  pos,
uint32_t  size,
OH_Drawing_TileMode  tileMode 
)

Creates an OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect that generates a radial gradient given the center and radius.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
centerPtIndicates the center of the circle for the gradient.
radiusIndicates the radius of the circle for this gradient.
colorsIndicates the colors to be distributed between the two points.
posIndicates the relative position of each corresponding color in the colors array.
sizeIndicates the number of colors and pos.
tileModeIndicates the tile mode.
Returns
Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect object created.
Since
11
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_ShaderEffectCreateRadialGradientWithLocalMatrix()

OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect* OH_Drawing_ShaderEffectCreateRadialGradientWithLocalMatrix ( const OH_Drawing_Point2D *  centerPt,
float  radius,
const uint32_t *  colors,
const float *  pos,
uint32_t  size,
OH_Drawing_TileMode  tileMode,
const OH_Drawing_Matrix *  matrix 
)

Creates an OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect that generates a radial gradient given the center and radius.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
centerPtIndicates the center of the circle for the gradient.
radiusIndicates the radius of the circle for this gradient.
colorsIndicates the colors to be distributed between the two points.
posIndicates the relative position of each corresponding color in the colors array.
sizeIndicates the number of colors and pos.
tileModeIndicates the tile mode.
matrixIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Matrix object, which represents the local matrix of the created OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect object. If matrix is nullptr, defaults to the identity matrix.
Returns
Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect object created. If nullptr is returned, the creation fails. The possible cause of the failure is any of centerPt, colors and pos is nullptr.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_ShaderEffectCreateSweepGradient()

uint32_t  size,

)

const OH_Drawing_Matrix *  matrix 
)

Creates an OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect that generates a conical gradient given two circles.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
startPtIndicates the center of the start circle for the gradient.
startRadiusIndicates the radius of the start circle for this gradient.
endPtIndicates the center of the start circle for the gradient.
endRadiusIndicates the radius of the start circle for this gradient.
colorsIndicates the colors to be distributed between the two points.
posIndicates the relative position of each corresponding color in the colors array.
sizeIndicates the number of colors and pos.
tileModeIndicates the tile mode.
matrixIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_Matrix object, which represents the local matrix of the created OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect object. If matrix is nullptr, defaults to the identity matrix.
Returns
Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_ShaderEffect object created. If nullptr is returned, the creation fails. The possible cause of the failure is any of startPt, endPt, colors and pos is nullptr.
Since
12
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_TypefaceCreateFromCurrent()

OH_Drawing_Typeface* OH_Drawing_TypefaceCreateFromCurrent ( const OH_Drawing_Typeface *  current,
const OH_Drawing_FontArguments *  fontArguments 
)

Creates an OH_Drawing_Typeface object with the specified font arguments from an existing OH_Drawing_Typeface object.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
currentIndicates the existing OH_Drawing_Typeface object.
fontArgumentsIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_FontArguments object.
Returns
Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_Typeface object created. If nullptr is returned, the creation fails. The possible cause of the failure is that the available memory is empty, or either current or fontArguments is nullptr, or current does not support the variations described in fontArguments.
Since
13
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_TypefaceCreateFromFileWithArguments()

OH_Drawing_Typeface* OH_Drawing_TypefaceCreateFromFileWithArguments ( const char *  path,
const OH_Drawing_FontArguments *  fontArguments 
)

Creates an OH_Drawing_Typeface object with the specified font arguments from a file. If the OH_Drawing_Typeface object does not support the variations described in fontArguments, this function creates an OH_Drawing_Typeface object without font arguments. In this case, this function provides the same capability as OH_Drawing_TypefaceCreateFromFile.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
pathIndicates the file path.
fontArgumentsIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_FontArguments object.
Returns
Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_Typeface object created. If nullptr is returned, the creation fails. The possible cause of the failure is that the available memory is empty, or either path or fontArguments is nullptr, or the path is invalid.
Since
13
Version
1.0

◆ OH_Drawing_TypefaceCreateFromStream()

OH_Drawing_Typeface* OH_Drawing_TypefaceCreateFromStream ( OH_Drawing_MemoryStream *  memoryStream,
int32_t  index 
)

Creates an OH_Drawing_Typeface object by given a stream. If the stream is not a valid font file, returns nullptr. Ownership of the stream is transferred, so the caller must not reference it or free it again.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
memoryStreamIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_MemoryStream object.
indexmemory stream index.
Returns
Returns the pointer to the OH_Drawing_Typeface object created.

◆ OH_Drawing_TypographyGetLongestLine()

double OH_Drawing_TypographyGetLongestLine ( OH_Drawing_Typography *  typography)

Obtains the width of the longest line. You are advised to round up the return value in actual use. When the text content is empty, the minimum float value, that is, -340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000, is returned.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
typographyPointer to an OH_Drawing_Typography object, which is obtained by OH_Drawing_CreateTypography.
Returns
Returns the width of the longest line.
Since

Version
1.1

◆ OH_Drawing_TypographyStyleIsHintEnabled()

Gets whether the hinting is enabled.

SystemCapability.Graphic.Graphic2D.NativeDrawing

Parameters
styleIndicates the pointer to an OH_Drawing_TypographyStyle object.
Returns
True, if the hinting takes effect; False, if the hinting does not take effect.
